definition: open-topped container (mounted on a truck or cart) for carrying loads/dump box (of a dump truck)/bucket (of a front loader)/wheelbarrow
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: The ends of each fibre rope were tied casually to a chain on the carrier rear-fence.
sentences.chinese: 每条纤维绳的末端均随意地系于车斗尾板一条链子上。

sentences.english: George jumped from the basket and fell headlong into the snow.
sentences.chinese: 乔治从车斗里跳出来，倒栽葱地摔倒在雪地里。

sentences.english: South Korea's Cha Du-ri reacts after losing to Uruguay June 26.
sentences.chinese: 韩国的车斗里的反应后输给乌拉圭6月26日。

sentences.english: The fibre ropes used were just those left on the carrier of the lorry for general use.
sentences.chinese: 所用的纤维绳仅为置于货车车斗内的一般绳子。

definition: variant of 車廂|车厢[che1 xiang1]
small model car/mini-car/small horse-cart/barrow/wheelbarrow/type of folk dance
